title: Russia detains suspect in car bomb attack that killed general
snippets: The FSB say they detained a "Ukrainian special services agent". Kyiv has not commented on the attack.
titles: Russia detains suspect in car bomb attack that killed general
summary: The FSB announced the detention of an individual claimed to be an agent for Ukrainian special services. As of now, there has been no official response or comment from Kyiv regarding the detention or the circumstances surrounding the alleged attack.

title: Moment driver sees huge explosion rip through Iran port
snippets: At least four people have been killed and 500 more injured in Bandar Abbas.
titles: Moment driver sees huge explosion rip through Iran port
summary: At least four individuals lost their lives and another 500 were injured in an incident in Bandar Abbas. The current status of the situation or the cause of the incident has not been provided in the information available.

title: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis
snippets: Entire Strip, with a population of two million people, may be on the brink of famine as WFP runs out of supplies.
titles: Thirteen killed, dozens under rubble as Israel bombs Gaza amid food crisis
summary: The Strip, home to two million residents, faces a potential famine due to the World Food Programme (WFP) depleting its supplies. This critical shortage threatens the food security of the entire population in the area.

title: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas appoints aide as PLO deputy
snippets: Hussein al-Sheikh is a veteran leader of Abbas's Fatah movement.
titles: Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas appoints aide as PLO deputy
summary: Hussein al-Sheikh is a seasoned leader within Fatah, the political and military organization led by Mahmoud Abbas.

title: Huge blast at key Iranian port kills eight and injures more than 750
snippets: A private security firm said it believed the affected containers had contained solid fuel destined for ballistic missiles.
titles: Huge blast at key Iranian port kills eight and injures more than 750
summary: A private security firm reported that the containers impacted in a recent incident were believed to contain solid fuel intended for ballistic missiles. This conclusion highlights concerns regarding the transportation and safety of materials associated with missile technology.

title: Gavin McKenna Ties Modern-Era CHL Point-Streak Record
snippets: The legend of Gavin McKenna continues to grow. On Friday, the Medicine Hat Tigers forward extended his point streak to 50 games, which ties the CHL record for the longest in the modern era (2000-2025). The only other player to achieve the feat was Quebec Remparts forward Alexander Radulov, who hit the milestone during the 2005-06 season and playoffs.
titles: Gavin McKenna Ties Modern-Era CHL Point-Streak Record
summary: Gavin McKenna, a forward for the Medicine Hat Tigers, has matched the CHL record for the longest point streak in the modern era (2000-2025) by extending his streak to 50 games on Friday. This achievement ties him with Alexander Radulov, who set the record during the 2005-06 season and playoffs with the Quebec Remparts.

title: Saints NFL draft picks 2025: Full list of New Orleans’ draft picks for every round
snippets: The Saints finished 5-12 last season, their worst year since going 3-13 in 2005.
Jerod Mayo lasted just one season in New England, with the Patriots going 4-13 before firing Mayo and hiring former Patriot Mike Vrabel as the new head coach.
The Eagles enter this season as the defending champions after dominating the Chiefs in Super Bowl LIX in February.
titles: Saints NFL draft picks 2025: Full list of New Orleans’ draft picks for every round
Patriots NFL draft picks 2025: Full list of New England’s draft picks for every round
Eagles NFL draft picks 2025: Full list of Philadelphia’s draft picks for every round
summary: The New Orleans Saints ended their season with a 5-12 record, marking their poorest performance since 2005. Jerod Mayo was fired as head coach of the New England Patriots after a 4-13 season, with Mike Vrabel taking over the role. The Philadelphia Eagles are the current Super Bowl champions, having defeated the Kansas City Chiefs in Super Bowl LIX in February.

title: With pick 180 at the top of the 6th round the Raiders select DT JJ Pegues out of Ole Miss
snippets: Just like they did at the end of day two, the Raiders have double up on trench players. This time it's DT JJ Pegues at pick 180.
titles: With pick 180 at the top of the 6th round the Raiders select DT JJ Pegues out of Ole Miss
summary: The Raiders selected defensive tackle JJ Pegues with the 180th pick, marking their continued focus on strengthening their line by choosing trench players for the second consecutive day.

title: West Virginia Mountaineers: Transfer 101: Kade Hensley
snippets: Breaking down everything you need to know about the transfer addition of Coastal Carolina kicker Kade Hensley to WVU.
titles: West Virginia Mountaineers: Transfer 101: Kade Hensley
summary: Coastal Carolina kicker Kade Hensley has transferred to West Virginia University (WVU). This move aims to strengthen WVU's special teams with Hensley's proven track record. At Coastal Carolina, Hensley demonstrated his kicking abilities, which WVU hopes to leverage in upcoming seasons. This transfer is part of WVU's strategy to enhance its team's performance through experienced talent acquisition.

title: What draft experts said about new Packers edge rusher Collin Oliver
snippets: What draft experts said about new Packers edge rusher Collin Oliver, the team's fifth-round pick.
titles: What draft experts said about new Packers edge rusher Collin Oliver
summary: The Green Bay Packers selected edge rusher Collin Oliver in the fifth round of the draft. Draft experts view Oliver as a promising talent with strong potential to impact the Packers' defense. They highlight his impressive pass-rushing skills and athletic ability, noting his success in college. Oliver is expected to contribute to the Packers' defensive lineup, with experts optimistic about his development and role on the team.

title: China seizes disputed reef in the South China Sea
snippets: Sandy Cay is just kilometres from the Philippines’ military outpost at Thitu Island
titles: China seizes disputed reef in the South China Sea
summary: Sandy Cay, located only a few kilometers away from the Philippines' military outpost at Thitu Island, is a significant geographical feature in the region. This proximity highlights the strategic importance of both locations in terms of national security and territorial claims.

title: Kremlin claims to have pushed Ukraine out of Kursk as Trump criticises Putin
snippets: Russia acknowledges presence of North Korean troops on the ground for the first time
titles: Kremlin claims to have pushed Ukraine out of Kursk as Trump criticises Putin
summary: For the first time, Russia has officially acknowledged the presence of North Korean troops on the ground. This marks a significant development, as it is the initial confirmation by Russia of North Korean military involvement. The specifics of the troops' roles or numbers were not disclosed in the acknowledgment.

title: Trump and Zelenskyy hold ‘productive’ discussion at Pope’s funeral
snippets: World leaders gathered in Rome as US and Ukrainian presidents met for first time since Oval Office row
titles: Trump and Zelenskyy hold ‘productive’ discussion at Pope’s funeral
summary: World leaders convened in Rome, marking the first meeting between the US and Ukrainian presidents since their disagreement in the Oval Office. This gathering signifies a step towards diplomatic engagement following the tension.

title: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
snippets: Proposal to fold the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board into the SEC will boost Donald Trump’s deregulatory agenda
titles: Republicans plan to scrap US audit regulator
summary: A proposal has been made to integrate the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) into the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). This move is aimed at advancing former President Donald Trump's agenda to reduce regulatory burdens.

title: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
snippets: Move by employees at Google’s AI arm follows discontent after weapons and surveillance pledge is dropped
titles: DeepMind UK staff seek to unionise and challenge defence deals and Israel links
summary: Employees at Google's AI division have expressed their discontent following the company's decision to abandon a pledge against working on weapons and surveillance technologies. This move has led to a significant reaction from the staff, indicating a potential internal conflict or disagreement with the company's direction in terms of ethical considerations and the use of AI technology.

title: US government defunds research on misinformation
snippets: The US National Science Foundation cancelled funding for research on misinformation, disinformation and AI-generated deepfakes, even as misleading information runs rampant on social media
titles: US government defunds research on misinformation
summary: The US National Science Foundation has terminated funding for projects focused on researching misinformation, disinformation, and AI-generated deepfakes. This decision comes at a time when the spread of misleading information on social media platforms is widespread.
